meanings.definition: A person or thing that clones.
meanings.sent1: The scientist was a skilled cloner, creating exact copies of plants.
meanings.sent2: The cloner in the lab was busy replicating the DNA of the mouse.
meanings.sent3: The cloner machine malfunctioned, making miniature versions of everything.
meanings.sent4: She was a cloner of ideas, spreading her innovative thoughts to others.
meanings.sent5: The cloner's ability to duplicate objects amazed everyone in the room.

meanings.definition: To produce a copy or imitation of.
meanings.sent1: He wanted to cloner his favorite toy to share it with his friend.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to cloner the famous painting for an exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The chef tried to cloner the secret recipe but ended up with a disaster.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a cloner, perfectly replicating every detail of the event.
meanings.sent5: The machine could cloner any document within seconds, making work easier.
